name: Broken Banners
description:
A new take on Tower Defense
Combining mechanics from the beloved tower defense genre with auto battlers such as Autochess and Dota Underlords, this game features exciting gameplay, new challenges and great replay-value!

Enemies and Bosses
Defend your kingdom from hordes of monsters!

Factions
Each tower belongs to a faction, build multiple of the same faction to gain powerful buffs!

Upgrade Towers
Gather three of the same towers to upgrade it, gaining new abilities!

Items and Synergies
Create synergies and adapt your strategy with items!

Gold and Interest
Manage your economy to stay ahead of the curve!

Unique, Challenging Maps
Hand-drawn maps each with it's own strategic challenges and themes!
